column4: anyone know any cross-platform (ubuntu&windowsxp) music managers? I am trying to sync music libraries between 4 computers (2 windows and 2 linux)
yes, and I already have that using xinorama
what happens when you resize the movie windows while on the TV to fill the screen ?
so basically, it's really the 'full screen'' command on the player that does the trouble. What about other player s?
You were right, it has something to do with VLC, it works in Totem
it is a plausible solution to switch your movie-watching to Totem ?
I would rather use VLC :) Will check VLC settings for some clues...
last thing I get think about is check any resolution settings in your ubuntu config or in VLC
otherwise, good luck and at least you can Totem your movies :) :P
solved! There is a setting for which screen to use for fullscreen (advanced)
